basics.name: Akhil Tiwari
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced software engineer specializing in high-frequency trading systems, low-latency execution platforms, and distributed ledger technologies. Proven track record in developing scalable and efficient solutions for financial institutions and blockchain projects.

work.name: Gemini
work.description: Financial Exchange for trading crypto and associated derivatives.
highlights: Designed and implemented highly available, low latency, and scalable services in C++ that run in parallel to legacy systems.
Implemented services to enhance Trading System Administration by publishing events to UM.
Developed translator applications to publish events from the match engine and ledger services to Kafka, improving system integration and data flow.

work.name: Morgan Stanley
work.description: Global financial services firm focusing on investment banking and wealth management.
highlights: Developed a Beneficiary Ownership Check hop for preventing wash trades, enhancing trade compliance and risk management.
Engineered a smart order router for Bovespa (Brazil), Biva | BMV (Mexico) & TSX (Canada) with a median roundtrip latency of ~27 microseconds.

Created comprehensive system tests for verifying smart-order router functionality, implemented LogReplay Scripts, and developed EOD LogAnalyzer scripts for improved system reliability and performance analysis.

work.name: Edelweiss
work.description: Leading Indian financial services conglomerate offering a wide range of financial products and services.
highlights: Contributed to the development of an in-house low latency trading platform for sponsored access to Institutional Clients, achieving a median roundtrip latency of ~200 nanoseconds.
Developed a real-time risk metrics dashboard for limit checks, enhancing risk management capabilities for institutional clients.

work.name: Deqode
work.description: Blockchain technology solutions provider specializing in decentralized applications and protocols.
highlights: Led the development of an in-house high throughput distributed ledger (Blaze protocol), advancing the company's blockchain capabilities.
Developed Howdoo's backend for token distribution using a Bitshares fork, showcasing expertise in blockchain integration.
Engineered multiple smart contracts on the EOS.IO network, demonstrating proficiency in decentralized application development.

work.name: Barclays
work.description: Multinational investment bank and financial services company.
highlights: Developed and maintained critical components of the contact center desktop application, improving customer service efficiency.
Awarded 'Outstanding Performer' for reducing UI latency by 15% in November 2018, significantly enhancing user experience.
